The Yuandian Yijing Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Wugou Town, Suixi County, Huaibei City, Anhui Province

operators: 安徽省亳州煤业有限公司 (Anhui Bozhou Coal Industry Co., Ltd.)
owners: 淮北矿业控股股份有限公司 (Huaibei Mining Holdings Co., Ltd.)
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Anhui Bozhou Coal Industry Co., Ltd., which is a subsidiary of Huaibei Mining Holdings Co., Ltd.
